description: Expansion of 10*x / ((1 - x) * (1 - 10*x)^2) in powers of x.
comments: This is not the same as A052246. They differ at a(11) and beyond. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 14 2014
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (21,-120,100).
maple: seq(sum(x*10^x,x=0..a),a=0..100); # Jorge Coveiro (jorgecoveiro(AT)yahoo.com), Dec 22 2004a:=n->sum((10^(n-j)*(n-j)),j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=0..16); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2008
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 01 2000
